name: Abilene Aero, Inc.
about: Abilene Aero, Inc., established in 1968, is a locally owned fixed-base operator (FBO) at Abilene Regional Airport (KABI). We provide a comprehensive range of aviation services, including aircraft sales, charter, maintenance, avionics, and parts. Our commitment to excellence is guided by principles of quality, honesty, and integrity. We offer 24-hour fueling services, including Jet-A and 100LL, and have IS-BAH Stage 2 certification with NATA Safety 1st trained technicians. Our mission is to provide a superior customer experience, meeting unique needs and solving problems with dedication and reliability. We strive to build long-term relationships and achieve sustainable profitability, ensuring excellence in aviation for our customers and community.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
